Francais: le prêtre, en disant: «Faites le compte de toute l'assemblée des enfants d'Israël depuis l'âge de vingt ans et au-dessus, selon leurs maisons patriarcales, de tous les hommes d'Israël et état de porter les armes.»
Anglais: Take the sum of all the congregation of the children of Israel, from twenty years old and upward, throughout their fathers' house, all that are able to go to war in Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nigi ma li ŋaɓta vi gurona vi Israyel goy kafe, tun caw tam busat dok-ma' ta-ta kulo kalam ɗaw', kuɗ jafna vi sumaysi kafe, nisi sa Israyella sa nagay kay ziy sle ma duur kafe.
Bulu: Lañane bôte bese yʼIsraél ataté mimbu mewôm mebaé a ke osu, avale menda me bôte map me né, ba bese yʼIsraél be ne nguleya nyoñe menga.
Guiziga: «Slufa jum ngi Israyeleye gar vur wazlaray vur wazlaray, mizli ngi vi kukur cuw hã nga mbuŋ, mindilaka le ngi gi vurum.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: “Lime yimɓe jama'aare Isra'iila fuu fodde ci'e muuɗum'en, ɓe duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri, waawanɓe hoo'ugo balmi konu fuu.”
Fulfulde_DC: “Lime yimɓe jama'aare Isra'iila fuu fodde ci'e muuɗum'en, ɓe duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri, waawanɓe hoo'ugo balmi konu fuu.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nutua kpɔk kpɔk, ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ o wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo yak nɛnɛ, nɛ nyɛma mɛ bi biro.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ɛ̀nɛ̀ tɔ́r o be  Israɛl  lɛŋ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ nutua kpɔk kpɔk, ku̧u̧naŋ-a tɛ o wi nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo yak nɛnɛ, nɛ nyɛma mɛ bi biro.»
Kapsiki_DC: «Ɓelate mə pɛtɛa ka Israyɛl keyita keyita, pɛtɛa zhili nyi nza va ta nci se te bakemsə kajive mbe kema, nyi kenza wərə dzemte mpa.»
Tupurri: Kee wee ngaäa tayge jar Israyel wo no, tï¡ï¡ wer ti kiñgi do äog ka' haçaç raw ciñ, ti moobe äaara, jar Israyel maga wo nen durgi mo äuy no.

Francais: Moïse et le prêtre Eléazar leur parlèrent donc dans les plaines de Moab, près du Jourdain, vis-à-vis de Jéricho, en disant:
Anglais: And Moses and Eleazar the priest spake with them in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho, saying,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Musus hiɗi mul-ma-ɗifinna Eliyazar law tisiya hay fulda vi Mowab, goboy hiɗi Yordan, ɗiger vok Yeriko. Nisi di tisi ala:
Bulu: Ane Môze a Aron be nga kobô be e minjeʼese ya Môab, e nsaʼa Yordan, zôsôôô a Yérikô be jôʼô na:
Guiziga: Moyis ati masay Elazara, a ɓaka Israyeley ar li micay ngi hirwuy Moˀap, migweˀ avu mizaw Zurdeŋ, puɗak angi Zeriko. A ɓaka taŋ na:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Muusa e Eli'azaaru maatini ɓe yaake ɓe ɗonno haa ladde Mo'ab baŋnge maayo Urdun haa fuunaaŋge Yeriko, ɓe mbi'i:
Fulfulde_DC: Muusa e Eli'azaaru maatini ɓe yaake ɓe ɗonno haa ladde Mo'ab baŋnge maayo Urdun haa fuunaaŋge Yeriko, ɓe mbi'i:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ o be  Israɛl  sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Mɔab ká̧ zaŋ Jurdɛn, tan nɛ Jeriko; wa tɔ̧a̧:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar tɔ̧ɔ̧ wen ha̧ o be  Israɛl  sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Mɔab ká̧ zaŋ Jurdɛn, tan nɛ Jeriko; wa tɔ̧a̧:
Kapsiki_DC: Pa yɛ Moyize le Ɛlazar gezete nda ke ka Israyɛl te ŋwela ta Mowab, takwa yitea Zhəwrdɛŋe ba'a kwa kema ta Zhɛriko. Ma ke hɛ sha hɛ:
Tupurri: Moyis kal wo fer waçaçre ne hara de Eleyasar je sië jagn äil ful ni jar Mowab wo, mañ äiñ bii Jurdeçeç, de ngafge de Jeriko. AÀ wo gano:

Francais: «Vous ferez le recensement du peuple depuis l'âge de vingt ans et au-dessus, comme Yahweh l'a ordonné à Moïse et aux enfants d'Israël, à leur sortie du pays d'Egypte.»
Anglais: Take the sum of the people, from twenty years old and upward; as the  Lord  commanded Moses and the children of Israel, which went forth out of the land of Egypt.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nay ma li ŋaɓta goyo, tun caw tam busat dok-ma' ta-ta kulo kalam ɗaw, ki Ma-Vatɗina vul hagata tam Musus hiɗi gurona vi Israyel nala, hay li ma nisi kali goy hay nagat Egipte pa.
Bulu: Bia zu lañe bôt ataté mimbu mewôm mebaé a ke ôsu, avale Nti a nga bendé Môze a bone bʼIsraél be nga so Ejipte.
Guiziga: «I sa slufaka mizli mindilaka le vi kukur cuw hã nga mbuŋ, kaɓa Bumbulvuŋ muɗuva ɓi nah da Moyise.» Israyeley muboko ti ruwuy Ezipte na, t'ani:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Mbinnde worɓe ɓe duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri fuu bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa. Ndaa Isra'iila'en wurtiiɓe lesdi Misra:
Fulfulde_DC: Mbinnde worɓe ɓe duuɓi noogas e ko ɓuri fuu bana Jawmiraawo umruno Muusa. Ndaa Isra'iila'en wurtiiɓe lesdi Misra:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Ɛɛ tɛ tɔr o be  Israɛl  nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana mbɛt hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ ga.» O be  Israɛl  nɛ gboo so nɛ nú Egiptɛ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Ɛɛ tɛ tɔr o be  Israɛl  nɛ a̧a̧ nɛ pɛ ɓu-yiitoo in o wan nɛ gana mbɛt hee mɔ'ɔ nɛ GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ ga.» O be  Israɛl  nɛ gboo so nɛ nú Egiptɛ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ:
Kapsiki_DC: «Kateɓela zhili nyi nza va ta nci se te bakemsə kajive mbe kema mbeli kala nya gezave nda Mahwətə ke Moyize.» Wa nyi hwelefefia Israyɛl nyi keshave mbe Ɛzhipte nyi:
Tupurri: Keegen tï¡ï¡ wer ti kiñgi do äog raw ciñ do maga Manwur hay waçaçn go ne Moyis wo de jar Israyel wo ti wur maga aà laa wo le go äi sir Ejipte mono.

Francais: Ruben, premier-né d'Israël. Fils de Ruben: de Hénoch, la famille des Hénochites; de Phallu, la famille des Phalluites;
Anglais: Reuben, the eldest son of Israel: the children of Reuben; Hanoch, of whom cometh the family of the Hanochites: of Pallu, the family of the Palluites:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ruben, goor ma vuɗi jewna vi Israyel. Gurona vi Ruben: Henok, ma jafna vi sa Henokŋa may goy hayam pana; Pallu, ma jafna vi sa Palluna may goy hayam pana.
Bulu: Ruben, ntôle yʼIsraél. Bone be Ruben ane mebume map me né: Beanokite ba so be Enok; Bepaluite ba so be Palu;
Guiziga: Dumbuŋ na, i sukwi ngi Ruben, modogom ngi Zakop. Dideˀ taŋhay ani: Henok a yi Henokoy, Palu a yi Paluhoy,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol Ruben afo Isra'iila: Ci'e Hanok, Pallu,
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol Ruben afo Isra'iila: Ci'e Hanok, Pallu,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kuti-a nɛ zuduk ko Rubɛn kaya-bem ko  Israɛl . Zuduk kɔ̧-a̧ gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, nú-gara ko Hanɔk, nú-gara ko Palu,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kuti-a nɛ zuduk ko Rubɛn kaya-bem ko  Israɛl . Zuduk kɔ̧-a̧ gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, nú-gara ko Hanɔk, nú-gara ko Palu,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kakwa ghate ne, yita ta Rəbɛn, tezhɛa wəzege ta Zhakob ya shɛ. Hwelefefi nyi kesawa mbe ŋwalea ŋkɛ ya mbe: ka Hanok nyi kesawa mbe Hanok, ka Paləw nyi kesawa mbe Paləw,
Tupurri: Ruben jag mbarga Israyel no, jar ni Ruben wo: Jar Henokid laa wo le go ti moobe mani Henog no, jar Palluwid laa wo le go ti moobe mani Pallu no.

Francais: de Hesron, la famille des Hesronites; de Charmi, la famille des Charmites.
Anglais: Of Hezron, the family of the Hezronites: of Carmi, the family of the Carmites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Hesron, ma jafna vi sa Hesronna may goy hayam pana; Karmi, ma jafna vi sa Karmina may goy hayam pana.
Bulu: Beesronite ba so be Esroñ; Bekarmite ba so be Karmi.
Guiziga: Hesroŋ a yi Hesroŋhoy, Karmi a yi Karmihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Hesruunu e Karmi.
Fulfulde_DC: Hesruunu e Karmi.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Ɛsrɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Ɛsrɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: ka Hɛsron nyi kesawa mbe Hɛsron, ka Karmi nyi kesawa mbe Karmi.
Tupurri: Jar Hetsronid laa wo le go ti moobe mani Hetsron no, jar Karmid laa wo le go ti moobe mani Karmi no.

Francais: Telles sont les familles des Rubénites; leurs recensés furent quarante-trois mille sept cent trente.
Anglais: These are the families of the Reubenites: and they that were numbered of them were forty and three thousand and seven hundred and thirty.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si jafna vi sa Rubenna, sa nisi li ŋaɓta visi goyna, nisi co noŋ pet birim dok-fiɗi yam ɦidi kalam kis-siɗiya hiɗi diram dok-ɦidi.
Bulu: Mebume me Ruben mme le, bôte bese yʼété be mbe toyini mewôm menyin a éla, mintete zamgbwa a mewôm mela.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Rubeney i taŋ, a gam jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur mufaɗ nga makir ti skat skat tarnaˀ ti kukur makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe nayo e tato e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe tato (43.730).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe nayo e tato e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe tato (43.730).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nú-gara ko Rubɛn nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wa tɔra wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ bíí nɛ wa kpaa nɛ 43.730.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nú-gara ko Rubɛn nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wa tɔra wa lɛŋ, ɓɛɛ bíí nɛ wa kpaa nɛ 43.730.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kahwelefefia Rəbɛn. Zhili 43.730 mbelia nci nyi keɓelate geva.
Tupurri: Sen mo ta' diñ moobe ma jar ni Ruben wo no. Jar maga aè kee ra hay wo ndar do naa ti swa'a de kiskis renam ti äe do swa'a.

Francais: -- Fils de Phallu, Eliab.
Anglais: And the sons of Pallu; Eliab.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Goora vi Pallu: Eliyab.
Bulu: E mone Palu jôé na Eliab,
Guiziga: Eliyap, mangal ngi Palu,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Pallu: Eliyabu
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Pallu: Eliyabu
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Bem ko Palu nɛ Eliab;
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Bem ko Palu nɛ Eliab;
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Ɛliyab, wəzege ta Paləw ne,
Tupurri: Jar ni Pallu wo: Eliyabe.

Francais: – Fils d'Eliab: Namuel, Dathan et Abiron. C'est ce Dathan et cet Abiron, membres du conseil, qui se soulevèrent contre Moïse et Aaron, dans la troupe de Coré, lorsqu'elle se souleva contre Yahweh.
Anglais: And the sons of Eliab; Nemuel, and Dathan, and Abiram. This is that Dathan and Abiram, which were famous in the congregation, who strove against Moses and against Aaron in the company of Korah, when they strove against the  Lord :
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Eliyab: Nemuwel, Datan hiɗi Abiram. Datan hiɗi Abiram kayni si sa nisi yisi hay tokŋa, may nisi yaw kulo'o kat Musus hiɗi Aaron, kuɗ vokŋa vi Kore, hay li ma nisi yaw kulo kat Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: a mbe ésaa Nemuél, Datan a Abiram. Datan a Abiram be mbe benya bôtô ya ékôan é nga tebe Môze ba Aron e ngame yat, be too e ngame Koré, éyoñe be nga ben e njôane Nti.
Guiziga: i cine ngi Nemuyel, ngi Dataŋ waɗ Abiram. Dataŋ ati Abirama, i mizli madiɗahay, taŋ a wuzla mizli mislam himaˀ avu Moyis ati Aroŋ tuwa. Taŋ mislikiɗam ɓi avu Bumbulvuŋ na, naɓa taŋ ati mizli ngi Korehey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: e ɓiyum'en: Nemuwel, Datan e Abiram. Datan e Abiram laatino ardiiɓe jama'aare. Kamɓe njokkirno bee Muusa e Haruna, hawtaade bee mooɓre Koora, saa'i ɓe tuurtani Jawmiraawo.
Fulfulde_DC: e ɓiyum'en: Nemuwel, Datan e Abiram. Datan e Abiram laatino ardiiɓe jama'aare. Kamɓe njokkirno bee Muusa e Haruna, hawtaade bee mooɓre Koora, saa'i ɓe tuurtani Jawmiraawo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: o bem ko Eliab nɛ Nemuɛl, Dataŋ in Abiram. Nɛ́ Dataŋ in Abiram nɛ yaa so nɛ gasawi nutua kɔ-wa'i a̧ kura so zu Moisɛ in Arɔŋ. Wa yaa so in o bíí ko Kore ŋgimbi nɛ wa dee nɛ ŋgazu in GASA WAN.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: o bem ko Eliab nɛ Nemuɛl, Dataŋ in Abiram. Nɛ́ Dataŋ in Abiram nɛ yaa so nɛ gasawi nutua kɔ-wa'i a̧ kura so zu Moisɛ in Arɔŋ. Wa yaa so in o bíí ko Kore ŋgimbi nɛ wa dee nɛ ŋgazu in GASA WAN.
Kapsiki_DC: yitenyɛa Neməwɛl, Datan ba'a Abiram ŋkɛ. Yɛ Datan le Abiram ka se kambeli nyi ghwene mbeli yitea tsene nyi kese kazhɛne nda ghə ke yɛ Moyize le Aron. Zlaɓe hɛ le mbeli nyi yitea Korɛ, vəa ŋkwa nya zhɛnete nda ghə hɛ ke Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Jar ni Eliyab wo: Nemuwel, Datan wo de Abiram. Joñ wo nen tayge ma giñ Moyis wo de ge AÈron na diñ Datan wo de Abiram sen so, ga giñ wo Manwur mono.

Francais: La terre, ouvrant sa bouche, les engloutit avec Coré, quand la troupe périt, et que le feu consuma les deux cent cinquante hommes: ils servirent d'exemple.
Anglais: And the earth opened her mouth, and swallowed them up together with Korah, when that company died, what time the fire devoured two hundred and fifty men: and they became a sign.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nagat mal vuna' goyo, na' kuluɓ kisi hiɗi Kore lay, sum sa tok hay liyn namna mit kafe, sum sa kis-ma' hiɗi diram dok-vaslna kaw kut ŋalsi goy kafe. Va ma li tisina mi ɗekka tam sum segena.
Bulu: Eyoñe te si é nga kui anyu a mine baa be Koré, e môse bôte bese be mbe e ngame jé be nga wu, a e môse nduan é nga diʼi bevevee be bôte befe mintete mibaé a mewôm metan. Jame te e mbe beta éveʼelaʼa e be bôte bevok.
Guiziga: Hirwuy a wun biɗiŋ, a nda taŋ jom ati Kore, mizli ngi Korehey mumicam cek, vu muwura mizli titiri kine, mizli skat skat cuw ti kukur zlum na. A biga taŋ di na ti bigi ɓa mizli mekelemey a wulkam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lesdi seeki les maɓɓe, moɗi ɓe. Ɓe maaydi bee Koora e mooɓre mum, saa'i yiite nyaami worɓe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe njowo (250). Ɗum laati barriya ngam Isra'iila'en.
Fulfulde_DC: Lesdi seeki les maɓɓe, moɗi ɓe. Ɓe maaydi bee Koora e mooɓre mum, saa'i yiite nyaami worɓe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe njowo (250). Ɗum laati barriya ngam Isra'iila'en.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nù mbaŋa so, ɓɛɛ gur wa in Kore ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ kuma nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ká wee dɔ nɛ bíí 250. Mɔ‘i duka so nɛ mɔɔ-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ha̧ o bíí.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nù mbaŋa so, ɓɛɛ gur wa in Kore ŋgimbi nɛ o bíí kɔ̧-a̧ kuma nɛnɛ, ɓɛɛ ká wee dɔ nɛ bíí 250. Mɔ‘i duka so nɛ mɔɔ-tɔ̧-mbɔrɔ ha̧ o bíí.
Kapsiki_DC: Tagha gɛ, pa hɛɗi ghwenemte geva ba'a ndahwe hɛ zlaɓe le Korɛ, te veci nya mpənji mbeli nyi yite ba'a nya teremte zhili nyi le mpi gwəmsə bake ba'a mcɛfemsə ghwə. Ghenci ka se kawəsə keyipə pa kaŋa mbeli nyi ketene.
Tupurri: Sir haç' jag äe go, kal lig rage go de Kore, de maga jar äen hu wo go, wuu roë jar ma kiskis äog ti äe do dween wo go. AÀ kal wo joñge diñ jar ma joñ hayya go ne ngaäan pel bole.

Francais: Mais les fils de Coré ne moururent pas.
Anglais: Notwithstanding the children of Korah died not.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Kore may mitɗi.
Bulu: Ve bone be Koré be nji ke wu éyoñe te.
Guiziga: Amma ziri ngi Koreheye, taŋ a micam tapasa ta ɓula.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa ɓiɓɓe Koora maayaay.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa ɓiɓɓe Koora maayaay.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɔ kpɔk, o bem ko Kore fe so kɔ‘i na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɔ kpɔk, o bem ko Kore fe so kɔ‘i na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama kempə ŋwalea tezhilia Korɛ te vecia shɛ we.
Tupurri: Jar ni Kore hu wo go.

Francais: Fils de Siméon, selon leurs familles: de Namuel, la famille des Namuélites; de Jamin, la famille des Jaminites;
Anglais: The sons of Simeon after their families: of Nemuel, the family of the Nemuelites: of Jamin, the family of the Jaminites: of Jachin, the family of the Jachinites:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Simeyon kuɗ jafna visiya: Nemuwel, ma jaf sum sa Nemuwella may goy hayam pana, Yamin, ma jaf sum sa Yaminna may goy hayam pana, Yakin, ma jaf sum sa Yakinna may goy hayam pana;
Bulu: Ayoñe Siméoñ e mbe mebum avale di: Benemuélite ba so be Nemuél; Beyaminite ba so be Yamin, Beyakinite ba so be Yakin;
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Simeyoŋ, vur muyo vur muyo, t'ani: Nemuyel, a yi Nemuyeley, Yamin a yi Yaminey, Yakin a yi Yakiney,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol Simeyon fodde ci'e mum: Nemuwel, Yamin, Yakin,
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol Simeyon fodde ci'e mum: Nemuwel, Yamin, Yakin,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk kɔ̧-a̧ gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Nemuɛl, nú-gara ko Yamin, nú-gara ko Yakin,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Simɛɔŋ nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk kɔ̧-a̧ gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Nemuɛl, nú-gara ko Yamin, nú-gara ko Yakin,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa yita ta Simɛyon ne, hwelefefi nyi ya shɛ: ka Neməwɛl nyi kesawa mbe Neməwɛl, ka Yamin nyi kesawa mbe Yamin, ka Yakin nyi kesawa mbe Yakin,
Tupurri: Jar ni Simeyoñ wo ti moobe äaara: Jar Nemuwelid laa wo le go ti moobe mani Nemuwel no. Jar Yaminid laa wo le ti moobe mani Yamin no. Jar Yakinid laa wo le go ti moobe mani Yakin no.

Francais: de Jachin, la famille des Jachinites; de Zaré la famille des Zaréites; de Saül, la famille des Saülites.
Anglais: Of Zerah, the family of the Zarhites: of Shaul, the family of the Shaulites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Zerak, ma jaf sum sa Zerakŋa may goy hayam pana, Sawul, ma jaf sum sa Sawulla may goy hayam pana.
Bulu: Bezérayite ba so be Zéra; Bekaulite ba so be Kaul.
Guiziga: Zera a yi Zerahay, Sawul a yi Sawuloy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Zeraha e Sawulu.
Fulfulde_DC: Zeraha e Sawulu.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Zɛra in nú-gara ko Saul.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Zɛra in nú-gara ko Saul.
Kapsiki_DC: ka Zɛra nyi kesawa mbe Zɛra, ka Shawəl nyi kesawa mbe Shawəl.
Tupurri: Jar Serahid laa wo le go ti moobe mani Sera no, jar Sawulid laa wo le go ti moobe mani Sawul no.

Francais: Telles sont les familles des Siméonites: vingt-deux mille deux cents.
Anglais: These are the families of the Simeonites, twenty and two thousand and two hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si jafna vi sum sa vi Simeyonna: Birim dok-ma' yam ma' hiɗi kis-ma'.
Bulu: Mebume me Siméoñ mme le: mese bôte toyini mewôm mebaé a ébaé a mintete mibaé.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Simeyoŋ i taŋ, a gam jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur cuw ti cuw ti mizli skat skat cuw.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine noogas e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo (22.200).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine noogas e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo (22.200).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O nú-gara ko Simɛɔŋ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i; wa lɛŋ nɛ o bíí 22.200.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O nú-gara ko Simɛɔŋ nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i; wa lɛŋ nɛ o bíí 22.200.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kahwelefefia Simɛyon. Zhili 22.200 mbeli nyi keɓelate geva.
Tupurri: Wo mo ta' diñ moobe maga laa wo le see Simeyoñ mono. AÀ wo ndar do äog ti äog ti äe kiskis äoge.

Francais: Fils de Gad, selon leurs familles: de Séphon, la famille des Séphonites; d'Aggi, la famille des Aggites; de Sunit, la famille des Sunites;
Anglais: The children of Gad after their families: of Zephon, the family of the Zephonites: of Haggi, the family of the Haggites: of Shuni, the family of the Shunites:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Gad, kuɗ jafna visiya visiya. Sefon, ma jafna vi sum sa Sefonna may goy hayam pana; Haggi, ma jafna vi sum sa Haggina may goy hayam pana, Sumi ma jafna vi sum sa Sumina may goy hayam pana,
Bulu: Ayoñe Gad e mbe mebum avale di: Besefônite ba so be Sefôn; Beagite ba so be Agi; Bekunite ba so be Kuni;
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Gata, dideˀ taŋhay ani: Sefoŋ a yi Sefoŋhoy, Hagia yi Hagihey, Suni a yi Sunihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol Gada fodde ci'e mum: Cefon, Haggi, Suni,
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol Gada fodde ci'e mum: Cefon, Haggi, Suni,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Gad nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Gad gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Sifiɔŋ, nú-gara ko Hagi, nú-gara ko Suni,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Gad nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Gad gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Sifiɔŋ, nú-gara ko Hagi, nú-gara ko Suni,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa yita ta Gad ne, hwelefefi nyi ya shɛ: ka Sefon nyi kesawa mbe Sefon, ka Hagi nyi kesawa mbe Hagi, ka Shəwni nyi kesawa mbe Shəwni,
Tupurri: Jar ni Gad wo ti moobe äaara: Jar Sefonid laa wo le go see moobe mani Sefon no, jar Haggid laa wo le go see moobe mani Haggi no. Jar Sunid laa wo le go see moobe mani Suni no.

Francais: d'Ozni, la famille des Oznites; de Her, la famille des Hérites;
Anglais: Of Ozni, the family of the Oznites: of Eri, the family of the Erites:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ozni, ma jafna vi sum sa Oznina may goy hayam pana, Eri, ma jafna vi sum sa Erina may goy hayam pana;
Bulu: Beôznite ba so be Ozni; Beerite ba so be Eri;
Guiziga: Ozni a yi Oznihey, Eri a yiˀerihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ojini, Eri,
Fulfulde_DC: Ojini, Eri,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Ozni, nú-gara ko Eri,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Ozni, nú-gara ko Eri,
Kapsiki_DC: ka Ozni nyi kesawa mbe Ozni, ka Ɛri nyi kesawa mbe Ɛri,
Tupurri: Jar Osnid laa wo le see moobe mani Osni no, Jar Erid laa wo le go see moobe mani Erid no.

Francais: d'Arod, la famille des Arodites; d'Ariel, la famille des Ariélites.
Anglais: Of Arod, the family of the Arodites: of Areli, the family of the Arelites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Arod, ma jafna vi sum sa Arodna may goy hayam pana, Areeli, ma jafna vi sum sa Areella may goy hayam pana.
Bulu: Bearôdite ba so be Arôd; Beafélite ba so be Aréli.
Guiziga: Arot a yi Arotoy, Areli a yi Arelihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Aroodi e Areeli.
Fulfulde_DC: Aroodi e Areeli.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Arodi, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Areli.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Arodi, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Areli.
Kapsiki_DC: ka Arod nyi kesawa mbe Arod, ka Arɛli nyi kesawa mbe Arɛli.
Tupurri: Jar Arodid laa wo le go see moobe mani Arod no, jar Areyelid laa wo le go see moobe mani Areyeli no.

Francais: Telles sont les familles des fils de Gad, selon leurs recensés: quarante mille cinq cents.
Anglais: These are the families of the children of Gad according to those that were numbered of them, forty thousand and five hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni mi jafna vi gurona vi Gad, kuɗ ŋaɓta visiya, nisi noŋ pet birim dok-fiɗi hiɗi kis-vasl.
Bulu: Mebume me Gad mme le mese bôte toyini mewôm menyin a mintete mitan.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Gata i taŋ, a gam jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur mufaɗ ti mizli skat skat zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe nayo e teemeɗɗe njowo (40.500).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe nayo e teemeɗɗe njowo (40.500).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Gad nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 40.500.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Gad nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 40.500.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kahwelefefia Gad. Zhili 40.500 mbeli nyi keɓelate geva.
Tupurri: Wo mo ta' diñ moobe jar ni Gad wo, do maga aè kee ra nono, aà wo ndar do naa de kiskis dwee.

Francais: Fils de Juda: Her et Onan; mais Her et Onan moururent au pays de Chanaan.
Anglais: The sons of Judah were Er and Onan: and Er and Onan died in the land of Canaan.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yuda: Er hiɗi Onan; may Er hiɗi Onan mit hay nagata Kanaan.
Bulu: Bone be Yuda: Er a Onan; ve Er a Onan be nga wu e Kanaan.
Guiziga: Ziri mizile ngi Zudahay i ti: Er ati Onaŋ, a micam angi hirwuy Kanaˀan.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa yita ta Zhəwda ne, yɛ Ɛr le Onan. Te hɛɗia Kanan mpənji yɛ Ɛr le Onan.
Tupurri: Jar ni Juda wo: Er wo de Onan.

Francais: Voici les fils de Juda selon leurs familles: de Séla, la famille des Sélaïtes; de Pharès, la famille des Pharésites; de Zaré, la famille des Zaréites.
Anglais: And the sons of Judah after their families were; of Shelah, the family of the Shelanites: of Pharez, the family of the Pharzites: of Zerah, the family of the Zarhites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi Yuda: Kuɗ jafna visiya visiya: Sum sa Selana may goy hay jafna vi Sela pa, sum sa Peresna may goy hay jafna vi Peres pa, sum sa Zerakŋa may goy hay jafna vi Zerak pa.
Bulu: Mebume me Yuda mme ma: Bekélanite ba so be Kéla; Bepérésite ba so be Perés; Bezérayite ba so be Zéra;
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Zuda, vur muyo vur muyo, t'ani: Sela a yi Selahay, Peres a yi Perizihey, Zera a yi Zeraˀahaya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: __Error__
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: __Error__
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Zhəwda nyi kehwelefe kehwelefe: ka Shɛla nyi kesawa mbe Shɛla, ka Pɛrɛs nyi kesawa mbe Pɛrɛs, ka Zɛra nyi kesawa mbe Zɛra.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu jar ni Juda wo ti moobe äaara: Jar Selalid laa wo le go see moobe mani Sela no, jar Partsid laa wo le go see moobe mani Perets no. Jar Sarhid laa wo le go see moobe mani Sera no.

Francais: -- Les fils de Pharès furent: de Hesron, la famille des Hesronites; de Hamul, la famille des Hamulites. --
Anglais: And the sons of Pharez were; of Hezron, the family of the Hezronites: of Hamul, the family of the Hamulites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Peres ay kayni Hesron ma jaf sa Hesronna may goy hayam pana, Hamul ma jaf sa Hamulla may goy hayam pana.
Bulu: Abume Pérés e bili Beesronite be soʼo be Esroñ; Beamulite be soʼo be Amul.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Periziheye, t'ani: Hesroŋ a yi Hesroŋhoy, Hamul a yi Hamuloy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: __Error__
Fulfulde_DC: __Error__
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nú-gara ko Pɛrɛs gbaa yiitoo: nú-gara ko Ɛsrɔŋ in nú-gara ko Hamul.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nú-gara ko Pɛrɛs gbaa yiitoo: nú-gara ko Ɛsrɔŋ in nú-gara ko Hamul.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Pɛrɛs nyi: ka Hɛsron nyi kesawa mbe Hɛsron, ka Haməwl nyi kesawa mbe Haməwl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Perets wo: Jar Hetsronid laa wo le go see moobe mani Hetsron no. Jar Hamulid laa wo le go see moobe mani Hamul no.

Francais: Telles sont les familles de Juda, selon leurs recensés: soixante-seize mille cinq cents.
Anglais: These are the families of Judah according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and sixteen thousand and five hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si jafna vi Yuda, kuɗ ŋaɓta visiya: Birim dok-siɗiya yam karkiya hiɗi diram kis-vasl.
Bulu: Mebume me Yuda mme le mese bôte toyini mewôme zamgbwa a ésaman a mintete mitan.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Zuda, a gi jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur tarnaˀ nga merkeɗ ti skat skat zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e njoweego e teemeɗɗe njowo (76.500).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e njoweego e teemeɗɗe njowo (76.500).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Juda nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 76.500.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Juda nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 76.500.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kahwelefefia Zhəwda. Zhili 76.500 mbeli nyi keɓelate geva.
Tupurri: Wo mo ta' diñ moobe ma jar ni Judan wo no, do maga aè kee ra nono: AÀ wo ndar do renam ti hiira' de kiskis dwee.

Francais: Fils d'Issachar selon leurs familles: de Thola, la famille des Tholaïtes;
Anglais: Of the sons of Issachar after their families: of Tola, the family of the Tolaites: of Puah, the family of the Punites:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Isakar kuɗ jafna visiya visiya: Sum sa Tolana may goy hay jafna vi Tola pa, sum sa Puvana may goy hay jafna vi Puva pa;
Bulu: Ayoñe Isakau e mbe e bili mebum avale di: Betolayite be soʼo be Tôla: Bepuvite be soʼo be Puva;
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Isakar, vur muyo vur muyo, t'ani: Tola a yi Tolahay, Puva a yi Puvahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol Issakar fodde ci'e mum: Tola, Puwa,
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol Issakar fodde ci'e mum: Tola, Puwa,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Isakar nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Isakar gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Tola, nú-gara ko Pua,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Isakar nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Isakar gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Tola, nú-gara ko Pua,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Isakar nyi kehwelefe kehwelefe: ka Tola nyi kesawa mbe Tola, ka Pəwva nyi kesawa mbe Pəwva,
Tupurri: Jar ni Isakar wo ti moobe äaaran wo: Jar Tolayid laa wo le go see moobe mani Tola no, jar punid laa wo le go see moobe mani Pufa no.

Francais: de Phua, la famille des Phuaïtes; de Jasub, la famille des Jasubites; de Semran, la famille des Semranites.
Anglais: Of Jashub, the family of the Jashubites: of Shimron, the family of the Shimronites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Yasubna may goy hay jafna vi Yasub pa, sum sa Simronna may goy hay jafna vi Simron pa.
Bulu: Beyakubite be soʼo be Yakub; Bekimrônite be soʼo be Kimrôn.
Guiziga: Yasuɓ a yi mizli Yasuɓoy, Simroŋ a yi Simroŋhoy.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yasuba e Simron.
Fulfulde_DC: Yasuba e Simron.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Yasub, in nú-gara ko Simrɔŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Yasub, in nú-gara ko Simrɔŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: ka Yashəwb nyi kesawa mbe Yashəwb, ka Shimron nyi kesawa mbe Shimron.
Tupurri: Jar Yasubid laa wo le go see moobe mani Yasub no, jar Simronid laa wo le go see moobe mani Simron no.

Francais: Telles sont les familles d'Issachar, selon leurs recensés: soixante-quatre mille trois cents.
Anglais: These are the families of Issachar according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and four thousand and three hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si jafna vi Isakar, kuɗ ŋaɓta visiya: Birim dok-karkiya yam fiɗi kalam kis-ɦidi.
Bulu: Mebume me Isakar mme le: mese bôte toyini mewôme mesaman a ényin a mintete mila.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Isakara, a gam jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur merkeɗ nga mufaɗ ti skat skat makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe njoweego e nayo e teemeɗɗe tato (64.300).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe njoweego e nayo e teemeɗɗe tato (64.300).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Isakar nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 64.300.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Isakar nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 64.300.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kahwelefefia Isakar. Zhili 64.300 mbeli nyi keɓelate geva.
Tupurri: Wo mo ta' diñ moobe ma jar ni Isakar wo no, do maga aè kee ra nono: AÀ wo ndar do hiira' ti naa de kiskis swa'a.

Francais: Fils de Zabulon selon leurs familles: de Sared, la famille des Sarédites; d'Elon, la famille des Elonites; de Jalel, la famille des Jalélites.
Anglais: Of the sons of Zebulun after their families: of Sered, the family of the Sardites: of Elon, the family of the Elonites: of Jahleel, the family of the Jahleelites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Zabulon kuɗ jafna visiya visiya: Sum sa Sardina may goy hay jafna vi Sered pa, sum sa Elonna may goy hay jafna vi Elon pa, sum sa Yahleella may goy hay jafna vi Yahleel pa.
Bulu: Ayoñe Zabuloñ e mbe e bili mebum avale di: Besérédite be soʼo be Séréde; Beelonite be soʼo be Elôn; Beyalétite be soʼo be Yalél.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Zabuloŋ vur muyo vur muyo, t'ani: Seret a yi Seretey, Eloŋ a yi Eloŋhoy, Yaleyel a yi Yaleyeley.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol Zabulon fodde ci'e mum: Seret, Elon e Yahaleyel.
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol Zabulon fodde ci'e mum: Seret, Elon e Yahaleyel.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Zabulɔŋ gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Sɛrɛd, nú-gara ko Elɔŋ, in nú-gara ko Yaleɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Zabulɔŋ nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Zabulɔŋ gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Sɛrɛd, nú-gara ko Elɔŋ, in nú-gara ko Yaleɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Zabəlon nyi kehwelefe kehwelefe: ka Sɛrɛd nyi kesawa mbe Sɛrɛd, ka Ɛlon nyi kesawa mbe Ɛlon, ka Yalɛyɛl nyi kesawa mbe Yalɛyɛl.
Tupurri: Jar ni Sabulon wo ti moobe äaaran wo no: Jar Sardid laa wo le go moobe mani Sered no, jar Elonid laa wo le see moobe mani Elon no, jar Yayelid laa le go see moobe mani Yaleel no.

Francais: Telles sont les familles issues de Zabulon, selon leurs recensés: soixante mille cinq cents.
Anglais: These are the families of the Zebulunites according to those that were numbered of them, threescore thousand and five hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si jafna vi sa Zabulonna, kuɗ ŋaɓta visiya: Birim dok-karkiya hiɗi kis-vasl.
Bulu: Mebume me Zabuloñ mme le, mese bôte toyini mewôme mesaman a mintete mitan.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Zabuloŋhoyo, a gam jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur merkeɗ ti skat skat zlum.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe njoweego e teemeɗɗe njowo (60.500).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe njoweego e teemeɗɗe njowo (60.500).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Zabulɔŋ nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 60.500.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Zabulɔŋ nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 60.500.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kahwelefefia Zabəlon. Zhili 60.500 mbeli nyi keɓelate geva.
Tupurri: Wo mo diñ moobe ma jar ni Sabulon wo no, do maga aè kee ra nono: AÀ wo ndar do hiira de kiskis dwee.

Francais: Fils de Joseph selon leurs familles: Manassé et Ephraïm.
Anglais: The sons of Joseph after their families were Manasseh and Ephraim.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Yosef, kuɗ jafna visiya: Manase hiɗi Efrayim.
Bulu: Meyoñe me Manasé a Efrayim me mbe me bili e mvoñe Yosef ése.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Zozefe, miyaka taŋ i Manase ati Efrayim.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ɓiɓɓe Yusufu fodde ci'e muuɗum'en: Manassa e Efrayim.
Fulfulde_DC: Ɓiɓɓe Yusufu fodde ci'e muuɗum'en: Manassa e Efrayim.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Jozɛf nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. O bem ko Jozɛf kɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ zuduk yiitoo, zuduk ko Manase in zuduk ko Efraim.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Jozɛf nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. O bem ko Jozɛf kɛ̧ɛ̧ tɛ zuduk yiitoo, zuduk ko Manase in zuduk ko Efraim.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma yita ta Manasɛ ba'a ŋa Ɛfrayim ne, sawa mbe Zhozɛf hɛ pɛtɛ.
Tupurri: Jar ni Josef wo ti moobe äaaran wo: Manase wo de Efrayim.

Francais: Fils de Manassé: de Machir, la famille des Machirites. -- Machir engendra Galaad; de Galaad, la famille des Galaadites. --
Anglais: Of the sons of Manasseh: of Machir, the family of the Machirites: and Machir begat Gilead: of Gilead come the family of the Gileadites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Manase: Sum sa Makira may goy hay jafna vi Makir pa, Makir vuɗ Galaad. Sum sa Galaadna may goy hay jafna vi Galaad pa.
Bulu: Ayoñe Manasé e mbe mebum avale di: Bemakirit be soʼo be Makir a Begaladite be soʼo be Galad e mone Makir.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Manase vur muyo vur muyo, t'ani: Makir a yi Makirey, Galaˀat mangal ngi Makir a yi Galaˀatay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Danygol Manassa: Ci'e Makir e Gile'at. Makir woni baaba Gile'at.
Fulfulde_DC: Danygol Manassa: Ci'e Makir e Gile'at. Makir woni baaba Gile'at.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Manase koo Makir, ɓɛɛ Makir de nú-gara kɔ‘i; Makir tɛɛ ko Galad, ɓɛɛ Galad de nú-gara kɔ‘i mbɛt.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Manase koo Makir, ɓɛɛ Makir de nú-gara kɔ‘i; Makir tɛɛ ko Galad, ɓɛɛ Galad de nú-gara kɔ‘i mbɛt.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Manasɛ nyi: ka Makir nyi kesawa mbe Makir, ka Gala'ad nyi kesawa mbe Gala'ad, wəzege ta Makir.
Tupurri: Jar ni Manase wo: Jar Makirid laa wo le see moobe mani Makir no, Makir biñ Galaad. Jar Galadid laa wo le go see moobe mani Galaad no.

Francais: Voici les fils de Galaad: Jézer, d'où la famille des Jézérites; de Hélec, la famille des Hélicites;
Anglais: These are the sons of Gilead: of Jeezer, the family of the Jeezerites: of Helek, the family of the Helekites:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi Galaad: Yeser, ma jaf sum sa Yesera may goy hayam pana; Helek, ma jaf sum sa Helekŋa may goy hayam pana,
Bulu: Abume Galad e mbe e bili be Yézérite be soʼo be Yézér; Beelékite be soʼo be Elék;
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Galaˀata kwana, i ti: Yezer a yi Yezerey, Helek a yi Helekey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa ci'e iwɗe haa Gile'at: I'ejer, Helek,
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa ci'e iwɗe haa Gile'at: I'ejer, Helek,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nú-gara kɔ̧-a̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Yezɛr, nú-gara ko Elɛk,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nú-gara kɔ̧-a̧ kɛ̧ɛ̧ dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Yezɛr, nú-gara ko Elɛk,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Gala'ad nyi: ka Yɛzɛr nyi kesawa mbe Yɛzɛr, ka Hɛlɛk nyi kesawa mbe Hɛlɛk,
Tupurri: Jar ni Galaad wo mokay no: Jar Yeserid laa wo le go see moobe mani Yeser no, jar Helekid laa wo le go see moobe mani Heleg no.

Francais: Asriel, d'où la famille des Asrielites; Séchem, d'où la famille des Séchémites;
Anglais: And of Asriel, the family of the Asrielites: and of Shechem, the family of the Shechemites:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Asriyel, ma hay jafna vi sum sa Asriyella, Sikem ma jafna vi sum sa Sikem may goy hayamna,
Bulu: Beasriélite be soʼo be Asriél; Bekékémite be soʼo be Kékém;
Guiziga: Asriyel a yi Asriyeley, Sekem a yi Sekemey,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Asriyel, Sikem,
Fulfulde_DC: Asriyel, Sikem,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Asriɛl, nú-gara ko Sikɛm,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Asriɛl, nú-gara ko Sikɛm,
Kapsiki_DC: ka Asriyɛl nyi kesawa mbe Asriyɛl, ka Shɛkɛm nyi kesawa mbe Shɛkɛm,
Tupurri: Jar Asriyerelid laa wo le go see moobe mani Asriyel no. Jar Sikemid laa wo le go see moobe mani Sikem no.

Francais: Sémida, d'où la famille de Sémidaïtes; Hépher, d'où la famille des Héphrites.
Anglais: And of Shemida, the family of the Shemidaites: and of Hepher, the family of the Hepherites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Semida, ma sum sa Semidana may goy hayam pana, Hefer, ma sum sa Hefera may goy hayam pana.
Bulu: Bekémidayite be soʼo be Kemida; Beeférite be soʼo be Efer.
Guiziga: Semida a yi Semidahay, Heferey a yi Hefer.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Semida e Hefer.
Fulfulde_DC: Semida e Hefer.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Semida, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Efɛr.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Semida, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Efɛr.
Kapsiki_DC: ka Shemiday nyi kesawa mbe Shemiday, ka Hɛfɛr nyi kesawa mbe Hɛfɛr.
Tupurri: Jar semidyid laa wo le go see moobe mani Semida no, jar Hefirid laa wo le go see moobe mani Hefer no.

Francais: Salphaad, fils d'Hépher, n'eut point de fils, mais il eut des filles. Voici les noms des filles de Salphaad: Maala, Noa, Hégla, Melcha et Thersa.
Anglais: And Zelophehad the son of Hepher had no sons, but daughters: and the names of the daughters of Zelophehad were Mahlah, and Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Selofkad goora vi Hefer, nam may fi guro jufayɗi, may nam fi guro-boyo. Kayni mi semda vi gurona vi Selofkad; Mahla, Nowa, Hogla, Milka hiɗi Tirsa.
Bulu: Selôfad, e mone Efer a nji ke biaé monafam ve bobebinga be too môé na: Mala, Nôa, Ogla, Milka a Tirsa.
Guiziga: Selofat, mangal ngi Hefere, a yi ziri mizileheye ta, sey mongosohoy, slimiɗ taŋhay ani: Mala, Nowa, Hogla, Milka waɗ Tirsa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Celofhad ɓii Hefer walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey ɓiɓɓe rewɓe tan. Inɗe maɓɓe: Mahala, No'a, Hogila, Milka e Tirsa.
Fulfulde_DC: Celofhad ɓii Hefer walaa ɓiɓɓe worɓe, sey ɓiɓɓe rewɓe tan. Inɗe maɓɓe: Mahala, No'a, Hogila, Milka e Tirsa.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Selofehad, bem ko Hefɛr bo so nɛ̀ be wiwii na; a̧ koo kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ o be okoo: nin-wa nɛ Mala, Nɔa, Ogla, Milka in Tirsa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Selofehad, bem ko Hefɛr bo so nɛ̀ be wiwii na; a̧ koo kɔ̧-a̧ nɛ o be okoo: nin-wa nɛ Mala, Nɔa, Ogla, Milka in Tirsa.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma Selofad, wəzege ta Hɛfɛr ne, keyake wəzege teza ŋkɛ we, deke ŋwale kwɛ. Wa nyi sləa ŋwalea kwɛa Selofad nyi: Mala, Nowa, Hogla, Milka ba'a Tirsa.
Tupurri: Selofhad je ni Hefern biñ twar gaa, aà biñ äen diñ tenaare tawa. Mokay diñ ëu mayre mani Selofhad wo no. Mahla, Nowa, Hogla, Milka wo de Tirtsa.

Francais: -- Telles sont les familles de Manassé; leurs recensés furent cinquante-deux mille sept cents.
Anglais: These are the families of Manasseh, and those that were numbered of them, fifty and two thousand and seven hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si jafna vi Manase, kuɗ ŋaɓta visiya: Birim dok-vasl yam ma' hiɗi kis-siɗiya.
Bulu: Mebume me Manasé mme le, mese bôte toyini mewôm metan a ébaé a mintete zamgbwa.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Manase, a gam jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur zlum nga cuw ti skat skat tarnaˀ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, yimɓe ujine cappanɗe njowo e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo (52.700).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, yimɓe ujine cappanɗe njowo e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo (52.700).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Manase nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 52.700.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Manase nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 52.700.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kahwelefefia Manasɛ. Zhili 52.700 mbeli nyi keɓelate geva.
Tupurri: Wo mo ta' diñ moobe mani jar ni Manasen wo no, do maga aè kee ra nono: AÀ wo ndar do dwee ti äog de kiskis renam.

Francais: Voici les fils d'Ephraïm selon leurs familles: de Suthala, la famille des Suthalaïtes; de Bécher, la famille des Béchrites; de Théhen, la famille des Théhénites.
Anglais: These are the sons of Ephraim after their families: of Shuthelah, the family of the Shuthalhites: of Becher, the family of the Bachrites: of Tahan, the family of the Tahanites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi Efrayim, kuɗ jafna visiya: Sum sa Sutalkina may goy hay Sutalk pa, sum sa Bakrina may goy hay Bakri pa, sum sa Takanna may goy hay Takan pa.
Bulu: Ayoñ Efrayim e mbe mebum avale di: Besutalit be soʼo be Sutéla; Bebakérite be soʼo be Béker; Betahanite be soʼo be Tahan.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Efrayim vur muyo vur muyo, t'ani: Sutela a yi Sutelahay, Beker a yi Bekerey, Tahaŋ a yi Tahaŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol Efrayim fodde ci'e mum: Sutelaha, Beker e Tahan.
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol Efrayim fodde ci'e mum: Sutelaha, Beker e Tahan.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Efraim, nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Efraim gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Sutɛla, nú-gara ko Bekɛr, in nú-gara ko Tahaŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Efraim, nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Efraim gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Sutɛla, nú-gara ko Bekɛr, in nú-gara ko Tahaŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Ɛfrayim nyi, kehwelefe kehwelefe: ka Shəwtɛla nyi kesawa mbe Shəwtɛla, ka Bɛkɛr nyi kesawa mbe Bɛkɛr, ka Tahan nyi kesawa mbe Tahan.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ jar Efrayim wo ti moobe äaaran wo no. Jar Sutalid laa wo le go see moobe mani Sutela no, jar Bakrid laa wo le go see moobe mani Beker no, jar Tahanid laa wo le go see moobe mani Tahan no.

Francais: – Voici les fils de Suthala: d'Héran, la famille des Héranites.--
Anglais: And these are the sons of Shuthelah: of Eran, the family of the Eranites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi Sutelak: Jafna vi sum sa Eranna may goy hay Eran pa.
Bulu: Bone be Sutéla: Beeranite be soʼo be Eran.
Guiziga: Eraŋ mangal ngi Sutela a yi Eraŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sutelaha danyi Eran.
Fulfulde_DC: Sutelaha danyi Eran.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Sutɛla koo Ɛraŋ, ɓɛɛ Ɛraŋ de nú-gara kɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Sutɛla koo Ɛraŋ, ɓɛɛ Ɛraŋ de nú-gara kɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Shəwtɛla nyi: ka Ɛran nyi kesawa mbe Ɛran.
Tupurri: Mo lag diñ jar ni Sela wo: Jar Eranid laa wo le go se moobe mani Eran no.

Francais: Telles sont les familles des fils d'Ephraïm, selon leurs recensés: trente-deux mille cinq cents. Ce sont là les fils de Joseph, selon leurs familles.
Anglais: These are the families of the sons of Ephraim according to those that were numbered of them, thirty and two thousand and five hundred. These are the sons of Joseph after their families.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si jafna vi Efrayim kuɗ ŋaɓta visi noŋ pet, nisi birim dok-ɦidi yam ma' hiɗi kis-vasl. Nisi kayni si gurona vi Yosef, kuɗ jafna visi kafe.
Bulu: Mebume mʼEfrayim mese bôte toyini mewôm mela a ébaé mintete mitan. Mebume ya meyoñe mete mebaé me nga bili mvoñe bôte Yôsep ése.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Efrayim a gi jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur makir nga cuw ti skat skat zlum. Ar slufa muyo, dideˀ ngi sukwi mucuw tayna i taŋ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe tato e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njowo (32.500).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe tato e ɗiɗo e teemeɗɗe njowo (32.500).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Efraim nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 32.500. O bezaŋ Jozɛf nɛ wa tɔra nɛ̀ nutua kpɔk kpɔk nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Efraim nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 32.500. O bezaŋ Jozɛf nɛ wa tɔra nɛ̀ nutua kpɔk kpɔk nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kahwelefefia Ɛfrayim. Zhili 32.500 mbeli nyi keɓelate geva. Nyi ya kaŋwale Zhozɛf nyi keɓelate geva kehwelefe kehwelefe.
Tupurri: Wo mo ta' diñ moobe ma jar ni Efrayim wo no, do maga aè kee ra nono: AÀ wo ndar do swa' ti äog de kiskis dwee. Wo mo ta' diñ jar ni Josef wo ti moobe äaaran wo.

Francais: Fils de Benjamin, selon leurs familles: de Béla, la famille des Bélaïtes; d'Asbel, la famille des Asbélites; d'Ahiram, la famille des Ahiramites;
Anglais: The sons of Benjamin after their families: of Bela, the family of the Belaites: of Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites: of Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Benyamin, kuɗ jafna visiya visiya, sum sa Balina may goy hay jafna vi Bela pa; sum sa Asbella may goy hay jafna vi Asbel pa, sum sa Akiramna may goy hay jafna vi Akiram pa,
Bulu: Ayoñe Bényamin e nga bili mebum avale di: Bebélayite be soʼo be Béla; Beakebélite be soʼo be Akebél; Beahiramite be soʼo be Ahiram;
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Benjameŋ, vur muyo vur muyo, t'ani: Bela a yi Belahay. Asebel a yi Asebeley, Ahiram a yi Ahiramay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol Benyamin fodde ci'e mum: Bela, Asbeel, Ahiram,
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol Benyamin fodde ci'e mum: Bela, Asbeel, Ahiram,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Bɛnjamin gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Bɛla, nú-gara ko Asbɛl, nú-gara ko Ahiram,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Bɛnjamin gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Bɛla, nú-gara ko Asbɛl, nú-gara ko Ahiram,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Bɛnjamɛn nyi kehwelefe kehwelefe: ka Bɛla nyi kesawa mbe Bɛla, ka Ashebɛl nyi kesawa mbe Ashebɛl, ka Ahiram nyi kesawa mbe Ahiram,
Tupurri: Jar ni Benjame wo ti moobe äaaran wo: Jar Balid laa wo le go see moobe mani Bela no, jar Asbelid laa wo le go see moobe mani Asbel no, jar Ahiramid laa wo le go see moobe mani Ahiram no.

Francais: de Supham, la famille des Suphamites; de Hupham, la famille des Huphamites.
Anglais: Of Shupham, the family of the Shuphamites: of Hupham, the family of the Huphamites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sum sa Skufamna may goy hay jafna vi Skufam pa, sum sa Hufamna may goy hay jafna vi Hufam pa.
Bulu: Bekufamite be soʼo be Kufam; Beufamite be soʼo be Ufam.
Guiziga: Sufam a yi Sufamay, Hufam a yi Hufamay,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Sefufam e Hufam.
Fulfulde_DC: Sefufam e Hufam.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Sefufam, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Hufam.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Sefufam, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Hufam.
Kapsiki_DC: ka Shəwfam nyi kesawa mbe Shəwfam, ka Həwfam nyi kesawa mbe Həwfam.
Tupurri: Jar Sufamid laa wo le go see moobe mani Sufam no, jar Hufamid laa wo le go see moobe mani Hufam no.

Francais: -- Les fils de Béla furent Héred et Noéman; de Héred, la famille des Hérédites; de Noéman, la famille des Noémanites. --
Anglais: And the sons of Bela were Ard and Naaman: of Ard, the family of the Ardites: and of Naaman, the family of the Naamites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Bela si Ard hiɗi Naaman: Sum sa Ardna may goy hay jafna vi Ard pa, sum sa Naamanna may goy hay jafna vi Naaman pa.
Bulu: Abume Bebélayite é nga bili Beardite be soʼo be Arde a Benamanit be soʼo be Naaman.
Guiziga: Muy ngi Belahay i ti: Arde a yi Ardehey, Nahamaŋ a yi Nahamaŋhay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ci'e Arda e Na'aman boo iwi haa Bela.
Fulfulde_DC: Ci'e Arda e Na'aman boo iwi haa Bela.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O nú-gara ko Bɛla kɛ̧ɛ̧ yiitoo dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, nú-gara ko Ard, in nú-gara ko Namaŋ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O nú-gara ko Bɛla kɛ̧ɛ̧ yiitoo dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, nú-gara ko Ard, in nú-gara ko Namaŋ.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Bɛla nyi: yɛ Arde le Na'aman. Ka Arde ya kahwelefefia Arde ba'a ka Na'aman ya kahwelefe ta Na'aman.
Tupurri: Jar ni Bela joñ ge wo diñ: Ard wo de Naaman. Jar Ardid laa wo le go see moobe mani Ard no, jar Naamanid laa wo le go see moobe mani Naaman no.

Francais: Tels sont les fils de Benjamin, selon leurs familles, et leurs recensés furent quarante-cinq mille six cents.
Anglais: These are the sons of Benjamin after their families: and they that were numbered of them were forty and five thousand and six hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si gurona vi Benyamin, kuɗ jafna visiya, kuɗ ŋaɓta visiya: Birim dok-fiɗi yam vasl hiɗi kis-karkiya.
Bulu: Mebume me Bényamin mme le, mese bôte toyini mewôm menyin a étan a mintete misaman.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Benjameŋhey muslufaka taŋ vur muyo vur muyo, a gam jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur mufaɗ nga zlum ti skat skat merkeɗe.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe nayo e njowo e teemeɗɗe njoweego (45.600).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe nayo e njowo e teemeɗɗe njoweego (45.600).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ nú-gara kpɔk kpɔk nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wa lɛŋ nɛ bíí 45.600
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Bɛnjamin nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ nú-gara kpɔk kpɔk nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i. Wa lɛŋ nɛ bíí 45.600
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kahwelefefia Bɛnjamɛn. Zhili 45.600 mbeli nyi keɓelate geva.
Tupurri: Mo lag diñ jar ni Benjame wo ti moobe äaaran wo, do maga aè kee ra nono: AÀ wo ndar do naa ti dwee de kiskis hiira'a.

Francais: Voici les fils de Dan, selon leurs familles: de Suham descend la famille des Suhamites. Telles sont les familles de Dan, selon leurs familles.
Anglais: These are the sons of Dan after their families: of Shuham, the family of the Shuhamites. These are the families of Dan after their families.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi Dan, kuɗ jafna visiya, sum sa Sukamna may goy hay jafna vi Sukam pa, nisi kayni si gurona vi Dan, kuɗ jafna visi kafe.
Bulu: Ayoñe Dañ e nga bili abume da Bekuhamite be soʼo be Kuham.
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Daŋ, vur muyo, naŋ purla si, i Suham.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol Dan fodde ci'e mum: Susam e danygol mum.
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol Dan fodde ci'e mum: Susam e danygol mum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa hɔɔ tɛ nú-gara ko Dan ɓɛɛ wa kpa nɛ zuduk kpɔk ɓɛɛ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ zuduk ko o be Suham.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa hɔɔ tɛ nú-gara ko Dan ɓɛɛ wa kpa nɛ zuduk kpɔk ɓɛɛ; mɛ̀ nɛ́ zuduk ko o be Suham.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Dan nyi, kehwelefe kehwelefe: ka Shəwham nyi kesawa mbe Shəwham. Nyi ya kaŋwalea Dan nyi keɓelate geva kehwelefe kehwelefe.
Tupurri: Wo mo lag diñ jar ni Dañ wo ti moobe äaaran wo: Jar Suhamid laa wo le go see moobe mani Suham no. Mo lag diñ moobe ma jar ni Dañ wo ti moobe äaaran wo no.

Francais: Total des familles des Suhamites, selon leurs recensés: soixante-quatre mille quatre cents.
Anglais: All the families of the Shuhamites, according to those that were numbered of them, were threescore and four thousand and four hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Tapta vi jafna vi sa Sukamna, kuɗ ŋaɓta visi noŋ pet: Birim dok-karkiya yam fiɗi hiɗi diram kis-fiɗi.
Bulu: Abume te e nga bili bôte toyini mewôm mesaman a ényin a mintete minyin.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Suhamay a gam jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur merkeɗ nga mufaɗ ti skat skat mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe njoweego e nayo e teemeɗɗe nayo (64.400).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe njoweego e nayo e teemeɗɗe nayo (64.400).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Suham nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 64.400.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nú-gara ko Suham nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 64.400.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma mbe hwelefe ta Shəwham ne, zhili 64.400 mbeli nyi keɓelate geva.
Tupurri: Ngaäa jar ma ti moobe mani jar ni Suhamidn tay wo äuy do maga aè kee ra nono: AÀ wo ndar do hiira' ti naa de kiskis naa.

Francais: Fils d'Aser, selon leurs familles: de Jemna, la famille des Jemnites; de Jessui, la famille des Jessuites; de Brié, la famille des Briéïtes.
Anglais: Of the children of Asher after their families: of Imnah, the family of the Jimnites: of Ishvi, the family of the Jesuites: of Beriah, the family of the Beriites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Aser, kuɗ jafna visi noŋ kafe. Sum sa Yimnana may goy hay jafna vi Yimna pa, sum sa Yikvina may goy hay jafna vi Yikvi pa, sum sa Beriyana may goy hay jafna vi Beriya pa.
Bulu: Ayoñe Azér e nga bili mebume avale di: Beimnayite be soʼo be Imana; Beikevite be soʼo be Ikevi; Beberiayite be soʼo be Beria;
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Aser, vur muyo vur muyo, t'ani: Imna a yi Imnahay, Isevi a yi Isevihey, Beriya a yi Beriyahay.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol Aser fodde ci'e mum: Yimna, Yisuwi e Beri'a.
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol Aser fodde ci'e mum: Yimna, Yisuwi e Beri'a.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Asɛr nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Asɛr gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Yimna, nú-gara ko Yiswi, in nú-gara ko Beria.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Asɛr nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Asɛr gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Yimna, nú-gara ko Yiswi, in nú-gara ko Beria.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Asɛr nyi, kehwelefe kehwelefe: ka Imna nyi kesawa mbe Imna, ka Ishevi nyi kesawa mbe Ishevi, ka Beriya nyi kesawa mbe Beriya.
Tupurri: Jar ni Aser wo ti moobe äaaran wo: Jar Yimnid laa wo le go see moobe mani Yimna no, jar Yisfid laa wo le go see moobe mani Yisfid no, jar Berid laa wo le go see moobe mani Beriya no.

Francais: -- Des fils de Brié: de Héber, la famille des Hébrites; de Melchiel, la famille des Melchiélites. --
Anglais: Of the sons of Beriah: of Heber, the family of the Heberites: of Malchiel, the family of the Malchielites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa may goy hay gurona vi Beriyana: Heber, ma sum sa Hebera may goy hayam pana, sum sa Malkiyella may goy hay Malkiyel pa.
Bulu: Abume Beberiayite é nga bili Beebérite be soʼo be Eber a Bemalkiélit be soʼo be Malkiél.
Guiziga: Muy ngi Beriyahay i ti: Heber a yi Heberey, Malkiyel a yi Malkiyeley,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ci'e Heber e Malkiyel boo iwi haa Beri'a.
Fulfulde_DC: Ci'e Heber e Malkiyel boo iwi haa Beri'a.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nú-gara ko Beria kɛ̧ɛ̧ yiitoo dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, nú-gara ko Ebɛr in nú-gara ko Malkiɛl.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nú-gara ko Beria kɛ̧ɛ̧ yiitoo dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧, nú-gara ko Ebɛr in nú-gara ko Malkiɛl.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Beriya nyi: ka Hɛbɛr nyi kesawa mbe Hɛbɛr, ka Malkiyɛl nyi kesawa mbe Malkiyɛl.
Tupurri: Jar maga laa wo le go see moobe mani jar ni Beriyan wo diñ: Jar Hebrid laa wo le go see moobe mani Malkiyel no.

Francais: Le nom de la fille d'Aser était Sara. --
Anglais: And the name of the daughter of Asher was Serah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sem goota vi Aser ala Serak.
Bulu: Azér a nga bili monaminga jôé na Séra.
Guiziga: Zuŋ mongoso ngi Aser ada, a zilaka Sera.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Innde ɓii Aser debbo, Seraha.
Fulfulde_DC: Innde ɓii Aser debbo, Seraha.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nin boko-bem ko Asɛr nɛ Sɛra.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nin boko-bem ko Asɛr nɛ Sɛra.
Kapsiki_DC: Sɛra ya kasləa wəzha ta Asɛr.
Tupurri: Ëu may mani Aser hay ga Sera.

Francais: Telles sont les familles des fils d'Aser, d'après leurs recensés: cinquante-trois mille quatre cents.
Anglais: These are the families of the sons of Asher according to those that were numbered of them; who were fifty and three thousand and four hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si jafna vi gurona vi Aser, kuɗ ŋaɓta visiya: Birim dok-vasl yam hiɗi kalam kis-fiɗi.
Bulu: Mebume mʼAzér mme le mese bôte toyini mewôme metan a éla a mintete minyin.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngi Aserey a gam jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur zlum nga makir ti skat skat mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe njowo e tato e teemeɗɗe nayo (53.400).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe njowo e tato e teemeɗɗe nayo (53.400).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bíí nɛ wa tɔra nú-gara ko Asɛr lɛŋ nɛ bíí 53.400.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bíí nɛ wa tɔra nú-gara ko Asɛr lɛŋ nɛ bíí 53.400.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kahwelefefia Asɛr. Zhili 53.400 mbeli nyi keɓelate geva.
Tupurri: Mo lag diñ moobe ma jar ni Asern wo no, do maga aè kee ra nono: AÀ wo ndar do dwee ti swa' de kiskis naa.

Francais: Fils de Nephthali, selon leurs familles: de Jésiel, la famille des Jésiélites; de Guni, la famille des Gunites;
Anglais: Of the sons of Naphtali after their families: of Jahzeel, the family of the Jahzeelites: of Guni, the family of the Gunites:
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Gurona vi Neftali kuɗ jafna visiya: Sum sa Yasiyella may goy hay Yasiyel pa, sum sa Gunina may goy hay Guni pa;
Bulu: Ayoñe Néftali e nga bili mebum ana: Beyasiélite be soʼo be Yasiél; Begunite be soʼo be Guni;
Guiziga: Sukwi ngi Neftali, vur muyo vur muyo, t'ani: Yasiyel a yi Yasiyeley, Guni a yi Gunihey,
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol Neftali fodde ci'e mum: Yahaciyel, Guni,
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol Neftali fodde ci'e mum: Yahaciyel, Guni,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Nɛftalii nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Nɛftalii gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Yaseɛl, nú-gara ko Guni,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Wa tɔra o bezaŋ Nɛftalii nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa. Zuduk ko Nɛftalii gbaa dam ɗoŋ o bem kɔ̧-a̧: nú-gara ko Yaseɛl, nú-gara ko Guni,
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi ŋwalea Nɛftali nyi, kehwelefe kehwelefe: ka Yasiyɛl nyi kesawa mbe Yasiyɛl, ka Gəwni nyi kesawa mbe Gəwni,
Tupurri: Jar Neftali wo ti moobe äaaran wo no: Jar Yatseyelid laa wo le go see moobe mani Yatseyel no, jar Gunid laa le go see moobe mani Guni no.

Francais: de Jéser, la famille des Jésérites; de Sellem, la famille des Sélémites.
Anglais: Of Jezer, the family of the Jezerites: of Shillem, the family of the Shillemites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: sum sa Yesera may goy hay Yeser pa; sum sa Silemna may goy hay Silem pa.
Bulu: Beyésérite be soʼo be Yéser; Bekilémite be soʼo be Kilém.
Guiziga: Yeser a yi Yeserey, Silem a yi Silemey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yejer e Sillem.
Fulfulde_DC: Yejer e Sillem.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Yɛsɛr, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Silɛm.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: nú-gara ko Yɛsɛr, ká bá nɛ̀ nú-gara ko Silɛm.
Kapsiki_DC: ka Yɛsɛr nyi kesawa mbe Yɛsɛr, ka Shilɛm nyi kesawa mbe Shilɛm.
Tupurri: Jar Yitsrid laa wo le go see moobe mani Yetser no, jar Sillemid laa wo le go see moobe ma jar ni Sillem no.

Francais: Telles sont les familles de Nephthali, selon leurs familles, et leurs recensés furent quarante-cinq mille quatre cents.
Anglais: These are the families of Naphtali according to their families: and they that were numbered of them were forty and five thousand and four hundred.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kayni si gurona vi Neftali, kuɗ jafna visiya hiɗi ŋaɓta visiya: Birim dok-fiɗi yam vasl hiɗi kis-fiɗi.
Bulu: Mebume me Néftali mme le, mese bôte toyini mewôm menyin a étan a mintete minyin.
Guiziga: Muy ngi Neftalihey muslufaka taŋ na, a gam jom gara, mizli durmuk kukur mufaɗ nga zlum ti skat skat mufaɗ.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe nayo e njowo e teemeɗɗe nayo (45.400).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal maɓɓe fuu, worɓe ujine cappanɗe nayo e njowo e teemeɗɗe nayo (45.400).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Nɛftalii nɛ wa tɔra nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i; dɔka wa lɛŋ nɛ bíí 45.500.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Nɛftalii nɛ wa tɔra nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa kpɔk kpɔk nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i; dɔka wa lɛŋ nɛ bíí 45.500.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kahwelefefia Nɛftali. Zhili 45.400 mbeli nyi keɓelate geva.
Tupurri: Mo lag diñ moobe ma jar ni Neftalin wo ti moobe äaaran wo, do maga aè kee ra nono: AÀ wo ndar do naa ti dwee de kiskis naa.

Francais: Tels sont les enfants d'Israël qui furent recensés: six cent un mille sept cent trente.
Anglais: These were the numbered of the children of Israel, six hundred thousand and a thousand seven hundred and thirty.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi kaf kayni si gurona vi Israyel sa li ŋaɓta visi goyna: Birim kis-karkiya hiɗi diram kep, kalam kis-siɗiya hiɗi diram dok-ɦidi.
Bulu: Bone bʼIsraél bese be nga lañeban be mbe toyini mintete misaman a jia mintete zamgbwa a mewôm mela.
Guiziga: Israyeleye cek, a gam jom gar na, mizli durmuk skat skat merkeɗ ti pal ti mizli skat skat tarnaˀ ti kukur makir.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal worɓe Isra'iila fuu ujine teemeɗɗe njoweego e go'o e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe tato (601.730).
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal worɓe Isra'iila fuu ujine teemeɗɗe njoweego e go'o e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo e cappanɗe tato (601.730).
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ  Israɛl  nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 601.730.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ  Israɛl  nɛ wa tɔra lɛŋ nɛ bíí 601.730.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma pɛtɛa ka Israyɛl nyi keɓelate geva ne, zhili 601.730.
Tupurri: Jar Israyel maga aè kee ra wo do kay nono: Ndar kiskis hiira' ti boñ de kiskis renam ti äe do swa'a.

Francais: Yahweh parla à Moïse, en disant:
Anglais: And the  Lord  spake unto Moses, saying,
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma-Vatɗina di tam Musus ala:
Bulu: Ane Nti a nga jô Môze na:
Guiziga: Bumbulvuŋ a ɓa Moyise:
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Nden Jawmiraawo wi'i Muusa:
Fulfulde_DC: Nden Jawmiraawo wi'i Muusa:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: GASA WAN tɔ̧ɔ̧ ha̧ Moisɛ:
Kapsiki_DC: Ma ke Mahwətə sha Moyize:
Tupurri: Manwur kal fer waçaçre ne Moyis day ga:

Francais: «A ceux-ci le pays sera partagé, pour être leur héritage, selon le nombre des noms.
Anglais: Unto these the land shall be divided for an inheritance according to the number of names.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nagat ma ɓurawa' gaa jarsiya, kay faraya' muɗ goy visiya, ŋram kuɗ ŋolda vi sumuna sumuna.
Bulu: Wo yiane kabe si mebim mebim avale meyoñ me né:
Guiziga: «Wunuka hirwuy da sukwiheye, weˀe avu taˀ ngi mizli ngi mizli.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: “Senndan le'i ɗi'i lesdi ndi'i haa ɗi mara ndi, fodde limgal maaji:
Fulfulde_DC: “Senndan le'i ɗi'i lesdi ndi'i haa ɗi mara ndi, fodde limgal maaji:
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: «Mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù ha̧ dukbíí nɔ'ɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: «Mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù ha̧ dukbíí nɔ'ɔ nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka wa.
Kapsiki_DC: «Ke ka yitehɛ nyi tenehe nda geva hɛɗi kawəsə kezeme ghɛ, kala nza ta ɓela ta mbeli.
Tupurri: AÈ joñ ge wo nen äes sirn go ti holañ äaara maga aà mo hay diñ tabul ma hoorge äaara, diñ see ngaäa jar sen wo no.

Francais: Aux plus nombreux tu donneras un héritage plus grand, et aux moins nombreux tu donneras un héritage plus petit; on donnera à chacun son héritage selon ses recensés.
Anglais: To many thou shalt give the more inheritance, and to few thou shalt give the less inheritance: to every one shall his inheritance be given according to those that were numbered of him.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nisi sa ka ir ŋolla naŋ ma vulsi nagat dig ŋolda visi lay, nisi sa ka ir goora, naŋ ma vulsi nagat goor digsi lay; naŋ ma ɓurawsi nagat ɗawn ŋra' kuɗ ŋaɓta visiya.
Bulu: ayoñ ese da ye nyoñe ngap avalʼane tañe bôt e nga lañeban é né; ayoñ e bili bôt abui da ye nyoñe si é ne ndam a lôt ayoñ e bili bôte tyôtyoé.
Guiziga: Sukwi gar na, a sa lum li weˀe avu taˀ taŋ. Sukwi mihaɗa na, ki vula taŋ li haɗi ya, sukwi mineˀkini kwana, kisa vulaŋ li neˀkine ya.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Lenyol maŋngol heɓan maral maŋngal, lenyol pamarol boo heɓan maral pamaral. Lenyol fuu heɓan maral mum fodde limgal mum.
Fulfulde_DC: Lenyol maŋngol heɓan maral maŋngal, lenyol pamarol boo heɓan maral pamaral. Lenyol fuu heɓan maral mum fodde limgal mum.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O wan nɛ bíí kɔ-wa dɔka nyɛmna, mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù ha̧ wa nɛ pɛsa-a, ɓɛɛ o wan nɛ bíí kɔ-wa dɔk na, mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù ha̧ wa tikiɗi. Kóó o ndé tɛ kpa nù nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka bíí kɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O wan nɛ bíí kɔ-wa dɔka nyɛmna, mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù ha̧ wa nɛ pɛsa-a, ɓɛɛ o wan nɛ bíí kɔ-wa dɔk na, mɛ tɛ kɛ̧ nù ha̧ wa tikiɗi. Kóó o ndé tɛ kpa nù nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka bíí kɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma yita nya kwele kwele ma ne, kateve nda hɛɗi na kwele kwele. Ma yita nya ɓɛhwɛ ne, kateve nda hɛɗi na ɓɛhwɛ. Ke yayata yita ne, kateve nda geva hɛɗi kala ɓela ta ŋkɛ.
Tupurri: Jar maga wo ngaäa mono, ndo haç ge tabul ma hoorge ne hara kluu lay, jar maga wo de peçeçre me' mono, ndo haç tabul ma hoorge ne hara de peçeçre me' lay. AÀ haç ge tabul ma hooge ne wosela diñ see ngaäa äaara maga aè hay kee ra mono.

Francais: Seulement le partage du pays aura lieu par le sort. Ils le recevront en partage selon les noms des tribus patriarcales.
Anglais: Notwithstanding the land shall be divided by lot: according to the names of the tribes of their fathers they shall inherit.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: May ɓurawta vi nagat ma li ɗawn hiɗi ŋaɓta kuɗ ɦayta, nisi ma fi galla visi ɗawn kuɗ semda vi sumaysiya sumaysiya.
Bulu: Ve jame da, akôsa bo ba ye fombô tañe bôt ayoñ ese e bili, nkabane si wo ye boban a mboon asimba .
Guiziga: A sa zuɓaka ti ceregezleŋ, amma weˀe avu taˀ ngi mizli ngir sukwi nah.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Senndu ndi bee waɗugo kur'u. Ɓe keɓan maral maɓɓe fodde le'i maɓɓe.”
Fulfulde_DC: Senndu ndi bee waɗugo kur'u. Ɓe keɓan maral maɓɓe fodde le'i maɓɓe.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mɛ tɛ pi̧ nɛ́ tani kɛ̧ nɛ nù. Wa tɛ kpa pɛsa nù nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka bíí tɛ zuduk kɔ-wa nɛ ɗoŋ dáà.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mɛ tɛ pi̧ nɛ́ tani kɛ̧ nɛ nù. Wa tɛ kpa pɛsa nù nyɛm nɛ ɗoŋ dɔka bíí tɛ zuduk kɔ-wa nɛ ɗoŋ dáà.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama laka kwasheghediɗi tenehe geva hɛɗi. Kateŋ'we ŋa nci hɛ bela kala ɓela ta mbeli nyi kwa yita ta nci.
Tupurri: Ama aè äes ge sirn diñ de naage waçywaàale. AÀ joñ ge wo nen daë tabul ma hoorgen diñ ti äï¡ï¡ni mani paçaçre äaaran wo no.

Francais: C'est par le sort que l'héritage sera réparti aux plus nombreux comme à ceux qui le sont moins.»
Anglais: According to the lot shall the possession thereof be divided between many and few.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Ma li ŋaɓta kuɗ hayta kay ɓuraw nagat jar sa kuɗ tuwsi ŋolla hiɗi sa kuɗ tuwsi kiɗayna.
Bulu: Mboon Asimba wo ye tyik afôla si meyoñ me nʼanen a ma me ne tyôtyoé ma nyoñ.
Guiziga: Hirwuy vay hana i ngi sukwi madiɗa malla ngi meciɗek gar na, mabiga i ceregezleŋ.»
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Kur'u senndan maral hakkunde ɗuuɗɓe e famarɓe.
Fulfulde_DC: Kur'u senndan maral hakkunde ɗuuɗɓe e famarɓe.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kóó bíí dɔka so nyɛmna, kóó bíí dɔk na mbɛt, nɛ́ tani a̧ tɛ de ha̧ o nde mɛ kpa fara-duk kɔ‘i.»
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kóó bíí dɔka so nyɛmna, kóó bíí dɔk na mbɛt, nɛ́ tani a̧ tɛ de ha̧ o nde mɛ kpa fara-duk kɔ‘i.»
Kapsiki_DC: Laka kwasheghediɗi tenehe geva hɛɗi kwelɛ yitehɛ nyi kwele kwele ma ba'a kwelɛ nyi ɓɛhwɛ ɓɛhwɛ ma.»
Tupurri: Diñ de naage waçywaàale ga aè äes ge tabul ma hoorgen ti holañ jar maga wo ngaäa pur mono, de jar maga wo de peçeçre me' mono.

Francais: Voici, selon leurs familles, les Lévites qui furent recensés: de Gerson, la famille des Gersonites; de Caath, la famille des Caathites; de Mérari, la famille des Mérarites.
Anglais: And these are they that were numbered of the Levites after their families: of Gershon, the family of the Gershonites: of Kohath, the family of the Kohathites: of Merari, the family of the Merarites.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si sa Levitna sa nisi li ŋaɓta visi goyna, kuɗ jafna visi kafe: Sum sa Gersonna may goy hay jafna vi Gerson pa, sum sa Kehatna may goy hay jafna vi Kehat pa, sum sa Merarina may goy hay jafna vi Merari pa.
Bulu: Be nga lañe mebume ya ayoñe Lévi avale di: Begersonite be soʼo be Gerson; Bekehatite be soʼo be Kéhat; be Merarite be soʼo be Merari.
Guiziga: Dideˀ ngir sukwi ngi levihey t'ani: Gersoŋ a yi Gersoŋhoy, Kehat a yi Kehatay, Merari a yi Merarihey.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ndaa lenyol Lewi fodde ci'e mum: Gerson, Kehat, Meraari,
Fulfulde_DC: Ndaa lenyol Lewi fodde ci'e mum: Gerson, Kehat, Meraari,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Levii nɛ wa tɔra nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: nú-gara ko Gɛrsɔŋ, nú-gara ko Kehat, in nú-gara ko Mɛrari.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Levii nɛ wa tɔra nɛ nú-gara kɔ-wa nɛ mɔɔ nɔ'ɔ: nú-gara ko Gɛrsɔŋ, nú-gara ko Kehat, in nú-gara ko Mɛrari.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma kwa yita ta Lɛvi ne, wa nyi hwelefefi nyi keɓelate geva nyi: ka Gɛrshon nyi kesawa mbe Gɛrshon, ka Kɛhat nyi kesawa mbe Kɛhat, ka Merari nyi kesawa mbe Merari.
Tupurri: Mokay diñ ëu jar Lefid maga aè kee ra ti moobe äaara mono: Jar Gersonid laa wo le go see moobe mani Gerson no, jar Kehatid laa wo le see moobe mani Kehad no, jar Merarid laa wo le go see moobe mani Merari no.

Francais: -- Voici les familles de Lévi; la famille des Lobnites, la famille des Hébronites, la famille des Moholites, la famille des Musites et la famille des Coréïtes. --
Anglais: These are the families of the Levites: the family of the Libnites, the family of the Hebronites, the family of the Mahlites, the family of the Mushites, the family of the Korathites. And Kohath begat Amram.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni mi jafna vi Levi: Jafna vi sa Libnana, jafna vi sa Hebronna, jafna vi sa Maklina, jafna vi sa Muskina, jafna vi sa Korina, Kehat vuɗ Amram.
Bulu: Mebume mete me nga bili menda avale di: Belebnite, Beébronite, Bemalit, be Mukite, a Bekoréite. Kéhat a mbe ésaa Amram,
Guiziga: Sukwi mineˀneˀkinihey ada angi sukwi ngi Levi vuna ma: Lipnihey, Hebroŋhoy, Malihey, Musihey waɗ Korihey. Kehat i cine ngi Amram.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Libni, Heburuun, Mahali, Musi e Koora. Kehat woni baaba Amram.
Fulfulde_DC: Libni, Heburuun, Mahali, Musi e Koora. Kehat woni baaba Amram.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O nú-gara ko Levii nɛ́ nú-gara ko Libni, ko Hebrɔŋ, ko Mali, ko Musi in ko Kore, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Kehat a̧ koo Amram.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O nú-gara ko Levii nɛ́ nú-gara ko Libni, ko Hebrɔŋ, ko Mali, ko Musi in ko Kore, ɓɛɛ nɛ́ Kehat a̧ koo Amram.
Kapsiki_DC: Wa nyi kweci nyi hwelefefia Lɛvi: ka Libni, ka Hɛbron, ka Mahli, ka Məwshi ba'a ka Korɛ. Kɛhat ya kayiteyɛa Amram.
Tupurri: Moobe maLefidn wo mo lag no: Moobe mani jar Libnid wo no, moobe mani jar Hebroñ wo no, moobe mani jar Mahlid wo no, moobe mani jar Musid wo no, moobe mani jar Koreyid wo no, Kehad biñ Amram.

Francais: Caath engendra Amram, et le nom de la femme d'Amram était Jochabed, fille de Lévi, que sa mère enfanta à Lévi en Egypte; elle enfanta à Amram Aaron, Moïse et Marie, leur soeur.
Anglais: And the name of Amram's wife was Jochebed, the daughter of Levi, whom her mother bare to Levi in Egypt: and she bare unto Amram Aaron and Moses, and Miriam their sister.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sem cata vi Amram ala Yokebed, goota vi Levi, ta Levi vuɗa'ay hay Egipteta, na' vuɗ guro mi Amram: Si Aaron, Musus hiɗi ɓasusit Miriyam.
Bulu: môt a nga luʼu Yokébéd e ngone Lévi é nga bialé Ejipte. Yokébéd a nga biaé Amram bone belaa: Aron, Môze a Kale jap Miriam.
Guiziga: Ngwas ngi Amrama, i Yokebet, zuŋ ngi Levi, a ya ka a Ezipte, Yokebet a yi ziri makir ti Amrama: Aroŋ, Moyis waɗ mongoso taŋ Miriyam.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Innde debbo Amram, Yokebet ɓii Lewi, o danyaaɗo haa Misra. O danyani Amram, Muusa e Haruna, non boo Miriyam, deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.
Fulfulde_DC: Innde debbo Amram, Yokebet ɓii Lewi, o danyaaɗo haa Misra. O danyani Amram, Muusa e Haruna, non boo Miriyam, deerɗiraawo maɓɓe debbo.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Kóò ko Amram nɛ Yokɛbɛd, boko-bem ko Levii nɛ wa koo sɛn Egiptɛ mɛ. A̧ koo Arɔŋ, Moisɛ, in Mariama boko-nya-wa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Kóò ko Amram nɛ Yokɛbɛd, boko-bem ko Levii nɛ wa koo sɛn Egiptɛ mɛ. A̧ koo Arɔŋ, Moisɛ, in Mariama boko-nya-wa.
Kapsiki_DC: Yokɛbɛd, wəzha ta Lɛvi nya keyake geva mbe Ɛzhipte, ya kasləa male ta Amram. Pa nde yake nda Aron, Moyize ba'a Miriyam nya kawəzha ta megheyɛa nci ke Amram.
Tupurri: Ëu waçy Amram hay ga Yakebed, may ma Lefi, maga Lefi hay äiñn le go Ejipte mono. AÀ mram biñ de äe mokay no: AÈron, Moyis wo de Miryam maygeman äaara no.

Francais: Il naquit à Aaron: Nadab et Abiu, Eléazar et Ithamar.
Anglais: And unto Aaron was born Nadab, and Abihu, Eleazar, and Ithamar.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Aaron vuɗ Nadab hiɗi Abihu, Eliyazar hiɗi Itamar.
Bulu: Aron émien a nga biaé bone benyin: Nadab, Abiyôn, Eléazar a Itamar.
Guiziga: Aroŋ a yi ziri mizilehey mufaɗa: Nadaɓ, Abihu, Elazar, waɗ Itamar.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Haruna danyanaama Nadab, Abihu, Eli'azaaru e Itamar.
Fulfulde_DC: Haruna danyanaama Nadab, Abihu, Eli'azaaru e Itamar.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Arɔŋ koo Nadab, Abihu Eleazar in Itamar.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ Arɔŋ koo Nadab, Abihu Eleazar in Itamar.
Kapsiki_DC: Pa Aron yake ŋwale wəfaɗe: Nadab, Abihəw, Ɛlazar ba'a Itamar.
Tupurri: AÈron joñ nen biñ weere do kay no lay no: Nadab wo de Abihu, Eleyasar wo de Itamar.

Francais: Nadab et Abiu moururent lorsqu'ils apportèrent du feu étranger devant Yahweh.
Anglais: And Nadab and Abihu died, when they offered strange fire before the  Lord .
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Nadab hiɗi Abihu mita, hay li ma nisi mar kuta pulta vok ir Ma-Vatɗina.
Bulu: Ve Nadab a Abiyôn be nga wu éyoñe be nga liti Nti mvean ôlobinda ô ne te yian.
Guiziga: Amma ti Nadap ati Abihu a micam asi taŋ muzlumaka urdi da Bumbulvuŋ ti vu ngi vra.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Ammaa Nadab e Abihu maayi, yaake ɓe lii'anino Jawmiraawo yiite nge senaaka.
Fulfulde_DC: Ammaa Nadab e Abihu maayi, yaake ɓe lii'anino Jawmiraawo yiite nge senaaka.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nadab in Abihu fee so wen nɛ wa baa so ŋma wee nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ ko GASA WAN na e ti a̧.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nadab in Abihu fee so wen nɛ wa baa so ŋma wee nɛ̀ bó nɛ́ ko GASA WAN na e ti a̧.
Kapsiki_DC: Ama nahe yɛ Nadab le Abihəw kempənji vəa ŋkwa nya terekɛ 'wərdə hɛ te ghwə nya wale wale kwa kema ta Mahwətə.
Tupurri: Nadab hu wo de Abihu ti maga aà nduu wo de wuu ma waare pel Manwur mono.

Francais: Leurs recensés, tous les mâles depuis l'âge d'un mois et au-dessus, furent vingt-trois mille. Car ils ne furent pas compris dans le recensement des enfants d'Israël, parce qu'ils ne leur fut point assigné d'héritage au milieu des enfants d'Israël.
Anglais: And those that were numbered of them were twenty and three thousand, all males from a month old and upward: for they were not numbered among the children of Israel, because there was no inheritance given them among the children of Israel.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sa nisi li ŋaɓta visi goyo, sa jufayn kaf, tun caw tam til kep ta-ta kulo kalam ɗaw kayni, nisi co pet birim dok-ma' yam ɦidi. Nisi may ŋaɓsi jar gurona vi Israyelɗi, kay galla visi may jar gurona vi Israyelɗi.
Bulu: Bôte bese be nga lañeban a bobefam, ataté ngone jia a lôte valé be mbe toyini mewôm mebaé a éla. Be nji ke lañeban baa be bone bʼIsraél bevok, amu be nji ke yiane nyoñe ngabe si ane be.
Guiziga: Dideˀ mizile ngi levihey, zle avu ziri mizile ngi kiya pal palay, hã avu mizli madiɗahay na, a gam jom gar na, mizli durmuk kukur cuw nga makir. A slufaka taŋ nga wuzla Israyel mekelemeye ta. Asi t'anta ti jiviɗ ngi lumam li mawunkaka da Israyel mekelemey gar na ta.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Limgal Lewi'en diga mo lewru e ko ɓuri fuu waɗi ujine noogas e tato (23.000). Kamɓe ɓe limdaaka bee Isra'iila'en woɗɓe, ngam ɓe keɓaay maral lesdi nder Isra'iila.
Fulfulde_DC: Limgal Lewi'en diga mo lewru e ko ɓuri fuu waɗi ujine noogas e tato (23.000). Kamɓe ɓe limdaaka bee Isra'iila'en woɗɓe, ngam ɓe keɓaay maral lesdi nder Isra'iila.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Levii, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ so nɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk in o wan nɛ gana lɛŋ nɛ wa tɔra nɛ bíí booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar. Wa tɔr wa mgbara o be  Israɛl  na, wen wa beka kpa so nù mgbara o dɔka be  Israɛl  na.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O bezaŋ Levii, o wiwii nɛ a̧a̧ so nɛ fio-zɛ kpɔk in o wan nɛ gana lɛŋ nɛ wa tɔra nɛ bíí booro-ɓu-yiitoo-zua-taar. Wa tɔr wa mgbara o be  Israɛl  na, wen wa beka kpa so nù mgbara o dɔka be  Israɛl  na.
Kapsiki_DC: Ma pɛtɛa ka Lɛvi nyi keɓelate geva, ŋwale tezhili nyi se te tere kwetɛŋe kajive mbe kema ne, mbeli 23.000. Kese mbeli kaɓela hɛ hwa ka Israyɛl, va nya ɗema hɛ kekemave ŋa nci bela ta hɛɗi we.
Tupurri: Jar maga aè kee ra mono, ma twerpiiri wo äuy maga tï¡ï¡ wer ti few boñ raw ciñ mono, hay wo äuy ndar do äog ti swa'a. AÀ hay bay de kee rage yoo jar Israyel wo wa, werga aè hay bay de haç tabul ma hoorge ne hara yoo jar Israyel wo ni wa.

Francais: Tels sont les hommes recensés par Moïse et Eléazar, le prêtre, qui firent le recensement des enfants d'Israël dans les plaines de Moab, près du Jourdain, vis-à-vis de Jéricho.
Anglais: These are they that were numbered by Moses and Eleazar the priest, who numbered the children of Israel in the plains of Moab by Jordan near Jericho.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kayni si gurona vi Israyel sa Musus hiɗi Eliyazar mul-ma-ɗifinna li ŋaɓta visi goyo, hay fulda vi Mowab, goboy hiɗi Yordan, ɗiger vok Yeriko.
Bulu: E bôte Môze baa Eléazar ntuni be nga lañ e minjeʼese ya Môab, bebé e Yordan, zôsôôô a Yérikô, mbe le.
Guiziga: Moyis ati masay Elazar muslufaka mizli Israyeley ar li micay ngi Moˀap, gweˀ a ciki mizaw Zurdeŋ, mupuɗak angi hirwuy Zeriko na, a kiɗ mi kahana.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Muusa e Eli'azaaru limanjo mbaɗi binndol, limi Isra'iila'en fuu, saa'i ɓe ɗonno nder laɗɗe Mo'ab baŋnge maayo Urdun, haa fuunaaŋge Yeriko.
Fulfulde_DC: Muusa e Eli'azaaru limanjo mbaɗi binndol, limi Isra'iila'en fuu, saa'i ɓe ɗonno nder laɗɗe Mo'ab baŋnge maayo Urdun, haa fuunaaŋge Yeriko.
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar tɔra sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Mɔab nɛ kur Jurdɛn tan nɛ ye Jeriko nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: O be  Israɛl  nɛ̀ Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Eleazar tɔra sɛn bɔkɔ-nú Mɔab nɛ kur Jurdɛn tan nɛ ye Jeriko nɛ mɔɔ nɔ‘i.
Kapsiki_DC: Nyi ya kambeli nyi ɓelate yɛ Moyize le nde dzeghe Shala Ɛlazar, te ŋwela ta Mowab, takwa yitea Zhəwrdɛŋe ba'a kwa kema ta Zhɛriko.
Tupurri: Mo lag diñ ëu jar Israyel maga Moyis kee wo ra de Eleyasar je sië jagn äi ful mani jar Mowab wo, ga mañ äiñ Jurdeçeç de ngafge de Jeriko mono.

Francais: Parmi eux, il n'y avait aucun des enfants d'Israël dont Moïse et Aaron le prêtre avaient fait le recensement dans le désert du Sinaï;
Anglais: But among these there was not a man of them whom Moses and Aaron the priest numbered, when they numbered the children of Israel in the wilderness of Sinai.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Sum sa Israyel nisin lakŋi, sa Musus hiɗi mul-ma-ɗifinna Aaron li ŋaɓta visi hay fulda vi Sinayna, mara kep kaw may jarsi tanɗi.
Bulu: Tekeʼe môte wua ya bôte Môze a Aron ntuni be nga lañ e nkôte si ya Sinayi a mbe été,
Guiziga: Moyis ati masay Aroŋ, mizli taŋ muslufaka taŋ zleˀe a wuzlaɓuh mikirɗak kirɗak ngi Sinay na, ko mizli tayna anta pal asi taŋ mata.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Yimɓe ɓe Muusa e Haruna limno nder ladde Sina fuu maaydi, walaa koo gooto maɓɓe lutti,
Fulfulde_DC: Yimɓe ɓe Muusa e Haruna limno nder ladde Sina fuu maaydi, walaa koo gooto maɓɓe lutti,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Mgbara o wi nɛ Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Arɔŋ baa tɔr so ŋga-gbárà Sinai mɛ‘i, kóó kpɔk bo ɓɔna,
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Mgbara o wi nɛ Moisɛ in wi-ɗafi-sɔ̧ Arɔŋ baa tɔr so ŋga-gbárà Sinai mɛ‘i, kóó kpɔk bo ɓɔna,
Kapsiki_DC: Ma hwa hɛ ne, wəndə shɛ ketene hwa mbeli nyi ɓelate yɛ Moyize le nde dzeghe Shala Aron, vəa ŋkwa nya ɓelate ka Israyɛl hɛ te ɓerama ta Sinay we.
Tupurri: Jar maga Moyis hay kee wo ra de AÈron mono hay bay wo yoo äaara ni wa so. AÀ hay kee wo jar Israyel wo le ti puuli ma Sinay no.

Francais: car Yahweh avait dit d'eux: «Ils mourront dans le désert»; et il n'en resta pas un, excepté Caleb, fils de Jéphoné, et Josué, fils de Nun.
Anglais: For the  Lord  had said of them, They shall surely die in the wilderness. And there was not left a man of them, save Caleb the son of Jephunneh, and Joshua the son of Nun.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Kay Ma-Vatɗin di goy jew ala: Nisi kaf ma mit goy hay fulda, mara ma hin kuɗsi kep noŋɗi, say Kaleb goora vi Yefune hiɗi Yosuwa goora vi Nun tuta.
Bulu: Amu Nti a nga taté kate be na, ba ye mane wu e nkôte si. Ajô te, teke môte wua a nga liʼi, veñgeveñge ve Kaléb e mone Yefuné a Yasua e mone Nun.
Guiziga: Naŋ kine, Bumbulvuŋ a ɓa taŋ di le zleˀe ɗaˀ ɗaˀ le, a sa micam pay a wuzlaɓuh. Sey mindiram i ti Kalep mangal ngi Yefune, waɗ Zozuwe mangal ngi Nun.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: ngam Jawmiraawo wi'no ɓe: “Fakat on fuu on maayan nder ladde, sonaa Kaaleb ɓii Yefunna e Yosuwa ɓii Nuuna tan.”
Fulfulde_DC: ngam Jawmiraawo wi'no ɓe: “Fakat on fuu on maayan nder ladde, sonaa Kaaleb ɓii Yefunna e Yosuwa ɓii Nuuna tan.”
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: wen GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ wa nde, wa tɛ fe ɓɔn ŋga-gbárà mɛ. O wan nɛ ɓɔna nɛ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ in Josue bem ko Nun ɓɛɛ.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: wen GASA WAN baa tɔ̧ so ha̧ wa nde, wa tɛ fe ɓɔn ŋga-gbárà mɛ. O wan nɛ ɓɔna nɛ Kalɛb bem ko Yefunɛ in Josue bem ko Nun ɓɛɛ.
Kapsiki_DC: Kwa nza ŋkɛ ne, ma ke Mahwətə gezete te ghəa nci: «Katempə hɛ te ɓerama.» Wəndə shɛ ketene, keɗema yɛ Kalɛb, wəzege ta Yefəwnɛ le Zhozəwɛ, wəzege ta Nəwn we.
Tupurri: Werga Manwur hay waçaç go ga: AÀ hu gi wo go ti puuli, day jobo gwa'ge boñ gaa, say diñ Kaleb je ni Yefunen wo de Josuwe je ni Nun no.

Francais: Alors s'approchèrent les filles de Salphaad, fils de Hépher, fils de Galaad, fils de Machir, fils de Manassé, des familles de Manassé, le fils de Joseph; leurs noms étaient Maala, Noa, Hégla, Melcha et Thersa.
Anglais: Then came the daughters of Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, the son of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, of the families of Manasseh the son of Joseph: and these are the names of his daughters; Mahlah, Noah, and Hoglah, and Milcah, and Tirzah.
BIBALDA_TA_PELDETTA: Guro-boyna vi Selofkad goora vi Heber, goora vi Galaad goora vi Makir, goora vi Manase, hay jafna vi Manase goora vi Yosef, sem guro-boy nisin ala Mahla, Nowa, Hogla, Milka hiɗi Tirsa.
Bulu: Mala, Nôa, Ogla, Milka a Tirsa be mbe bobebinga be Sélôfad, e mone Efer, e mone Galad, e mone Makir, e mone Manasé, e mone Yôsep.
Guiziga: Zozef a yi Manase, Manase a yi Makir, Makir a yi Galaˀat, Galaˀat a yi Hefer, Hefer a yi Selofat. Selofat a yi ziri mongosohay, i ti: Mala, Noˀa, Hogla, Milka waɗ Tirsa.
Fulfulde_Adamaoua: Celofhad ɓii Hefer ɓii Gile'at ɓii Makir ɓii Manassa ɓii Yusufu woodi ɓiɓɓe rewɓe. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Mahala e No'a e Hogila e Milka e Tirsa. Ɓe yimɓe saare woɗnde nder ci'e Manassa. Ɓe ɓaditi,
Fulfulde_DC: Celofhad ɓii Hefer ɓii Gile'at ɓii Makir ɓii Manassa ɓii Yusufu woodi ɓiɓɓe rewɓe. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Mahala e No'a e Hogila e Milka e Tirsa. Ɓe yimɓe saare woɗnde nder ci'e Manassa. Ɓe ɓaditi,
KALATA_KO_SC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o boko-bem ko Selofehad hɔa. Wa so nɛ o ŋma bíí tɛ ŋma nú-gara ko Manase, bem ko Jozɛf, wen nɛ́ Manase a̧ koo Makir, ɓɛɛ Makir ko Galad; Galad tɛɛ ko Efɛr, ɓɛɛ sɛka Efɛr ko Selofehad, dáà ko o boko-bem nɔ'ɔ. Nin-wa nɛ Mala, Nɔa, Ogla, Milka in Tirsa.
KALATA_KO_DC_Gbaya: Nɛ mɔ'ɔ nɛ o boko-bem ko Selofehad hɔa. Wa so nɛ o ŋma bíí tɛ ŋma nú-gara ko Manase, bem ko Jozɛf, wen nɛ́ Manase a̧ koo Makir, ɓɛɛ Makir ko Galad; Galad tɛɛ ko Efɛr, ɓɛɛ sɛka Efɛr ko Selofehad, dáà ko o boko-bem nɔ'ɔ. Nin-wa nɛ Mala, Nɔa, Ogla, Milka in Tirsa.
